import React from 'react' const BandSelector = ({step,setStep,setSite}) => { const makeSelection = (site) => { console.log(step) setStep(step+1) setSite(site) } return (

Which Slam Dunk are you attending?

makeSelection('north')}>

Slam Dunk North

Saturday 4th September 2021

makeSelection('south')}>

Slam Dunk South

Sunday 5th September 2021

) } export default BandSelector
